title: Hideo Kojima, Animal Crossing Books Coming West - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.19.21
description:
Greg and Julia Hardy talk about Kojima's book, Animal Crossing manga, and more! 

Follow Julia: www.instagram.com/gametotrain
